abstract: Former Iranian Pres Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani endorses Hassan Khomeini's decision to appeal his disqualification to run for seat on Assembly of Experts, council that will choose country's next supreme leader; Khomeini is reform-minded cleric and grandson of Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeni, founder of Islamic Republic.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Khomeini Grandson Receives an Endorsement After Disqualification
headline.main: Iran: Khomeini’s Grandson Receives an Endorsement After Disqualification

snippet: Hassan Khomeini said he would appeal his disqualification to run for a seat on the council, which is empowered to choose the next supreme leader.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Khomeini said he would appeal his disqualification to run for a seat on the council, which is empowered to choose the next supreme leader.
